Returns: Number of integers in the CircularIntArray.
size().Description: Get number of integers in the CircularIntArray.

getFirst().Description: Get first integer of the CircularIntArray.

Parameters: int: Number of integers to remove.
removeFromStart(int).Description: Remove multiple integers from front of the CircularIntArray, ignore when numOfElements is less than or equals to 0.

CircularIntArray().Description: Creates a circular array with default capacity.

getLast().Description: Get last integer of the CircularIntArray.

clear().Description: Remove all integers from the CircularIntArray.

Parameters: int: Number of integers to remove.
removeFromEnd(int).Description: Remove multiple elements from end of the CircularIntArray, ignore when numOfElements is less than or equals to 0.

Parameters: int: The zero based element index in the CircularIntArray.
Throws: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException} if n < 0 or n >= size().
get(int).Description: Get nth (0 <= n <= size()-1) integer of the CircularIntArray.

addFirst(int).Description: Add an integer in front of the CircularIntArray.

popLast().Description: Remove last integer from end of the CircularIntArray and return it.

addLast(int).Description: Add an integer at end of the CircularIntArray.

popFirst().Description: Remove first integer from front of the CircularIntArray and return it.

Parameters: int: the minimum capacity, between 1 and 2^30 inclusive
CircularIntArray(int).Description: Creates a circular array with capacity for at least minCapacity elements.

ClassDesc: CircularIntArray is a circular integer array data structure that provides O(1) random read, O(1) prepend and O(1) append. The CircularIntArray automatically grows its capacity when number of added integers is over its capacity.
